KDocTools Create documentation from DocBook Introduction Provides tools to generate documentation in various format from DocBook files Authors Eric Bischoff everything not named below Claudiu Costin conversion script for Romanian and Russian TeX output Frederik Fouvry DSSSL style file customisation and SGML setup David Rugge DocBook crash course and documentation template plus a number of people that made suggestions improved scripts sent bug reports etc etc
